name: strength
description: Strength is a measure of physical power.

name: dexterity
description: Dexterity is a measure of agility.

name: constitution
description: Constitution is a measure of health and stamina.

name: intelligence
description: Intelligence is a measure of reasoning and memory.

name: wisdom
description: Wisdom reflects how attuned a character is to the world around them.

name: charisma
description: Charisma measures a character's ability to interact effectively with others.

name: sensing
description: Sensing is a measure of a character's ability to perceive the world around them.

name: willpower
description: Willpower is a measure of a character's ability to resist outside influences.
